definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc

sentences.english: Her arms showed green patches, indicating heavy internal bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 她的胳膊出現了青斑，表明有嚴重的內出血。

sentences.english: He died hours later from internal bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 他幾小時後死於內出血。

sentences.english: Objective To establish an animal model with rabbit for study on monitoring intraperitoneal bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲腹腔內出血監護研究建立一種家兔動物模型。

sentences.english: Early identification of the source of occult intraabdominal blood loss may indicate the need for operative control of hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 早期鑑別腹腔內出血部位可以決定是否需要手術止血。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the reasons and experiences of misdiagnosis in gynecological patients with intraabdominal hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結婦產科腹腔內出血性疾病的誤診經驗教訓。

sentences.english: Eventually, Corexit also ruptures red blood cells causing internal bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 最終地，Corexit亦破裂紅血球造成內出血。

sentences.english: For cases with internal hemorrhage, Laparotomy is the best choice.
sentences.chinese: 發生腹腔內出血的病例以行開腹手術爲宜。

sentences.english: Bilateral simultaneous hypertensive intracerebral hemorrhages (HICH) are a rare occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 兩側性同時發生高血壓腦內出血甚爲罕見。

sentences.english: Necropsies revealed internal hemorrhaging, with no sign of pesticides.
sentences.chinese: 屍檢表明有內出血，但沒有殺蟲劑的跡象。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnostic and therapeutic features of traumatic intraventricular hemorrhage (TIVH).
sentences.chinese: 目的分析總結外傷性腦室內出血的診斷和治療特點。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the influence of hemorrhage extension on the prognosis in patients with brain parenchymal hemorrhage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腦實質內出血時，血液走向與預後的關係。

sentences.english: To date, carotid bruits have mostly been associated with bleeding events in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，頸動脈雜音大多被和腦內出血聯繫起來。

sentences.english: Yet nothing is being done to stem the haemorrhaging.
sentences.chinese: 然而，並沒有任何的措施阻止這種內出血。

sentences.english: Based on the impression of internal bleeding, an emergent laparotomy was performed after fluid resuscitation.
sentences.chinese: 經過檢查後，病童在腹內出血的診斷下接受緊急手術。

sentences.english: To summarize and investigate the main point of clinical observation and nursing of intraventricular hemorrhage (IVH) in premature infants.
sentences.chinese: 爲探討早產兒腦室內出血的觀察與護理要點。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy of the intraventricular hemorrhage treated by continuous drainage in the terminal cistern of spinal canal.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討持續腰大池外引流治療腦室內出血的療效。

definition: hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
